languages.text: {n}Очередное творение безумного гемункула, предназначенное для жестоких экспериментов. Колба — лишь часть большего механизма, в корпус которого встроена небольшая механическая панель. Символы на ней вам, однако, неизвестны. Толстые трубки, доставляющие подозрительную жидкость прямо в стеклянное чрево механизма, исчезают в его необъяснимо гладком корпусе. Однако само стекло кажется довольно хрупким.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Очередное творение безумного гемункула, предназначенное для жестоких экспериментов. Колба — лишь часть большего механизма, в корпус которого встроена небольшая механическая панель. Символы на ней вам, однако, неизвестны. Толстые трубки, доставляющие подозрительную жидкость прямо в стеклянное чрево механизма, исчезают в его необъяснимо гладком корпусе. Однако само стекло кажется довольно хрупким.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Очередное творение безумного гемункула, предназначенное для жестоких экспериментов. Колба — лишь часть большего механизма, в корпус которого встроена небольшая механическая панель. Символы на ней вам, однако, неизвестны. Толстые трубки, доставляющие подозрительную жидкость прямо в стеклянное чрево механизма, исчезают в его необъяснимо гладком корпусе. Однако само стекло кажется довольно хрупким.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Another one of the insane Haemonculos's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vial is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the glass bowels of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

{n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Otra de las demenciales creaciones del hemónculo diseñadas para sus crueles experimentos. La cuba forma parte de un mecanismo mayor que tiene integrado un pequeño panel mecánico. Sin embargo, los símbolos de los botones del panel no te resultan familiares. Las gruesas tuberías que suministran el sospechoso líquido a las profundidades vítreas del mecanismo desaparecen dentro de su inexplicablemente lisa envoltura. El cristal, por otro lado, parece bastante quebradizo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Otra de las demenciales creaciones del hemónculo diseñadas para sus crueles experimentos. La cuba forma parte de un mecanismo mayor que tiene integrado un pequeño panel mecánico. Sin embargo, los símbolos de los botones del panel no te resultan familiares. Las gruesas tuberías que suministran el sospechoso líquido a las profundidades vítreas del mecanismo desaparecen dentro de su inexplicablemente lisa envoltura. El cristal, por otro lado, parece bastante quebradizo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}これも狂気のハモンキュラスによる、残酷な実験目的で設計された創作物だ。この漕は、外壁に小さな機械式計器盤が組み込まれている大きな装置の一部のようだ。しかし、そこに描かれた記号にあなたは見覚えがない。怪しげな液体を装置の奥深くに送り込む何本もの太いチューブが、説明できないほど滑らかな外壁に消えていた。ただ材質のガラス自体はかなり脆いようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これも狂気のハモンキュラスによる、残酷な実験目的で設計された創作物だ。この漕は、外壁に小さな機械式計器盤が組み込まれている大きな装置の一部のようだ。しかし、そこに描かれた記号にあなたは見覚えがない。怪しげな液体を装置の奥深くに送り込む何本もの太いチューブが、説明できないほど滑らかな外壁に消えていた。ただ材質のガラス自体はかなり脆いようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这又是一件出自血伶人疯狂之手的造物，专门用来进行残忍的实验。这个容器只是某台巨型机器一小部分，外壳上置有小型机械操作面板，但你并不熟悉上面的符号。厚厚的管道没入机器难以置信的光滑外壳之中，可疑的液体通过管道，输送至这台玻璃机器深处。不过，用来制造容器的玻璃本身看起来不堪一击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这又是一件出自血伶人疯狂之手的造物，专门用来进行残忍的实验。这个容器只是某台巨型机器一小部分，外壳上置有小型机械操作面板，但你并不熟悉上面的符号。厚厚的管道没入机器难以置信的光滑外壳之中，可疑的液体通过管道，输送至这台玻璃机器深处。不过，用来制造容器的玻璃本身看起来不堪一击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Encore une folle invention de l'hémoncule conçue pour mener de cruelles expériences. La cuve fait partie d'un plus grand mécanisme muni d'un petit panneau de contrôle mécanique. Les symboles dont il est orné n'évoquent rien pour vous. Les épais tubes qui déversent le liquide suspect dans les profondeurs vitreuses du mécanisme disparaissent dans son enveloppe étrangement lisse. Le verre lui-même semble quant à lui plutôt fragile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Encore une folle invention de l'hémoncule conçue pour mener de cruelles expériences. La cuve fait partie d'un plus grand mécanisme muni d'un petit panneau de contrôle mécanique. Les symboles dont il est orné n'évoquent rien pour vous. Les épais tubes qui déversent le liquide suspect dans les profondeurs vitreuses du mécanisme disparaissent dans son enveloppe étrangement lisse. Le verre lui-même semble quant à lui plutôt fragile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein weiteres Machwerk des wahnsinnigen Haemonculus, erschaffen, um grausame Experimente durchzuführen. Der Tank ist Teil eines größeren Mechanismus, in dessen Gehäuse eine kleine Instrumententafel eingebaut ist. Du erkennst dort auch Symbole, die dir nicht vertraut vorkommen. Dicke Schläuche leiten eine verräterische Flüssigkeit direkt in die gläsernen Tiefen des Mechanismus und enden in dem sonderbar glatten Gehäuse. Das Glas selbst scheint aber ziemlich spröde zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein weiteres Machwerk des wahnsinnigen Haemonculus, erschaffen, um grausame Experimente durchzuführen. Der Tank ist Teil eines größeren Mechanismus, in dessen Gehäuse eine kleine Instrumententafel eingebaut ist. Du erkennst dort auch Symbole, die dir nicht vertraut vorkommen. Dicke Schläuche leiten eine verräterische Flüssigkeit direkt in die gläsernen Tiefen des Mechanismus und enden in dem sonderbar glatten Gehäuse. Das Glas selbst scheint aber ziemlich spröde zu sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deli Haimonkulus'un gaddar deneyleri için tasarladığı bir başka icat. Tank; kasasına küçük mekanik bir panel yerleştirilmiş, daha büyük bir mekanizmanın bir parçası. Ancak üzerindeki sembollere aşina değilsin. Kuşkulu görünen likidi doğruca mekanizmanın camdan yapılma alt kısmına ileten kalın tüpler, açıklanamayacak şekilde pürüzsüz olan kasaya girince gözden kayboluyor. Cam kısımsa oldukça kırılgan duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another of the insane Haemonculus's creations designed for cruel experiments. The vat is part of a larger mechanism which has a small mechanical dashboard built into its casing. You are, however, unfamiliar with the symbols on it. The thick tubes that deliver the suspicious-looking liquid straight into the vitreous depths of the mechanism disappear into its inexplicably smooth casing. The glass itself seems quite brittle, though.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deli Haimonkulus'un gaddar deneyleri için tasarladığı icatlarından biri daha. Tank, kasasına küçük mekanik bir panel yerleştirilmiş daha büyük bir mekanizmanın bir parçası. Ancak üzerindeki sembollere aşina değilsin. Kuşkulu görünen likidi doğruca mekanizmanın camdan yapılma alt kısmına ileten kalın tüpler, açıklanamayacak şekilde pürüzsüz olan kasaya girince gözden kayboluyor. Cam kısımsa oldukça kırılgan duruyor.{/n}
